body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     After Dark in the Park Video Archive - 2016     2013                After Dark in the Park Video Archives - 2013       Click on the links below for a description and video of each 2013 program     December 2013 December 17, 2013 - "John Keawe: LIVE in Concert" December 10, 2013 - "Carl Ray Villaverde: LIVE in Concert"      November 2013 November 26, 2013 - "Large Earthquakes in the Hawaiian Islands: What You Need to Know" November 5, 2013 - How Ecologists Pick a "Winning Team" in Forest Management     October 2013 October 29, 2013 - "Examining the 'Ōhi'a Lehua Ecosystem with Dr. Dieter Mueller-Dombois"     September 2013 September 10, 2013 - "Grand Adventures in the Southwest Desert"      August 2013 August 27, 2013 - "Na Wai Ola, The Living Waters: A Celebration of Rain Catchment"     July 2013 July 30, 2013 - "Laupāhoehoe Train Museum: Trains, Plantations & Heritage Along the Hāmākua Coast"     June 2013 June 25, 2013 - "Natural Resources of the Wai‘ōhinu Coast: Plants, Pools, Petroglyphs & Volunteer Participation!
